backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user profiles, crochet projects, tutorials, patterns, and materials with access control, blob storage mixins, and admin-only tutorial initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to Navigation component updates for identity state tracking and admin status refetching.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and routing structure with emphasis on semantic HTML, authentication flows, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter cards, canonical links, and JSON-LD structured data for the Crochet Craft Hub web application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (home, tutorials, projects, admin pages), ThemeProvider, Layout wrapper, and Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/ActiveProjectCar: Card component displaying user's active project with thumbnail, progress bar, time spent, and action buttons for updating progress or viewing details.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component rendering a full-width image with gradient overlay and welcome text for the application landing page.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploader.ts: A React component for uploading and managing multiple images with drag-and-drop support, progress tracking, and preview thumbnails. Handles file validation, upload progress display, and image removal with a configurable maximum image limit.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that provides consistent page structure with navigation header and footer. Footer includes social media links, quick navigation, and branding with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/MaterialsInput.t: Form component for adding, editing, and removing materials with fields for name, quantity, and unit. Displays materials as cards in a grid with inline editing and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/MaterialsList.ts: Read-only display component that renders a table of materials with name, quantity, and unit columns. Returns null if no materials are provided.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation bar component with authentication integration, responsive mobile menu, and dynamic links based on user role. Includes admin link visibility logic and triggers profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation with name and bio fields. Non-dismissible modal that appears when authenticated user has no profile.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Visual progress indicator component that displays a percentage value with color-coded styling based on completion level. Uses a progress bar with accompanying percentage text.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Clickable card component displaying project summary with thumbnail image, title, creator name, description, and completion badges. Navigates to project detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/TutorialCard.tsx: Clickable card component for displaying tutorial summaries with icon, title, step/material counts, difficulty badge, and description. Navigates to tutorial detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/TutorialForm.tsx: A React form component for creating and editing tutorials with fields for title, description, difficulty, dynamic steps, and materials lists. Handles validation and submission with support for both create and edit modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin tokens from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for the application, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, admin checks, and tutorial CRUD operations (get, create, update, delete). Manages query invalidation and caching strategies for data synchronization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a warm, craft-inspired color palette for both light and dark modes using HSL color values and CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up the React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCreatePage.tsx: Admin page for creating new tutorials, featuring access control checks and a TutorialForm that submits to the backend and navigates back to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEditPage.tsx: Admin page for editing existing tutorials by title parameter, with access control, tutorial loading, and form submission that updates the backend and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing tutorials with create, edit, and delete functionality. Includes access control checks and confirmation dialogs for destructive actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero section and four feature cards (Learn & Create, Share Your Work, Track Progress, Materials Guide) with call-to-action buttons. Adapts navigation based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/MyProjectsPage.tsx: Authenticated user's project list page displaying active projects in a grid layout. Shows empty state with call-to-action when no projects exist.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx: Detailed view of a single project showing title, creator, time spent, completion percentage, image carousel, and materials list. Fetches project by title parameter from URL.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsGalleryPage.t: Public gallery page displaying all community projects in a grid layout with loading skeletons and empty state. Uses ProjectCard component for each project.
frontend/src/pages/PublishProjectPage.ts: Form page for creating and publishing new crochet projects with fields for title, description, instructions, images (via ImageUploader), and materials (via MaterialsInput). Validates required fields before submission.
frontend/src/pages/TrackProjectPage.tsx: Page component for updating project progress with completion percentage slider, time spent input, and image uploader; fetches project by title from URL params and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/TutorialDetailPage.ts: Detail page displaying a single tutorial with materials list and step-by-step instructions; fetches tutorial by name from URL params with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/TutorialsPage.tsx: Landing page displaying a grid of tutorial cards with header and empty state; uses useGetTutorials hook to fetch and render all available tutorials.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme including fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), border radius variables, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a free crochet app with tutorials, project publishing, progress tracking, and materials lists; notes a known issue with admin navigation link not appearing after Internet Identity login.
